TIME.OFF.APPROVED.TITLE: Time Off Request
TIME.OFF.APPROVED.ERROR: Your operation is not completed. Please try again later.
TIME.OFF.MAX.DAY: You can have a maximum of -14 days of annual leave!
TIME.OFF.ERROR.ALREADY.DAY.USED: You have a used time offs within the date range you selected!
TIME.OFF.ERROR.MAX.DAY: Leave cannot be used more than the maximum number of days of the leave type you have chosen!
TIME.OFF.ERROR.MAX.EXCUSE.DAY: You can use a maximum of {maxOffDay} days of excused time off within 1 year!
TIME.OFF.ERROR.CANCEL: You cannot cancel used time off!
TIME.OFF.REJECTED.TITLE: Time Off Request Reject
TIME.OFF.REJECTED.DESCRIPTION: Please enter your reason for rejecting the time off request.
TIME.OFF.REJECTED.ERROR: Your operation is not completed. Please try again later.
TIME.OFF.INFO.CARD.EXCUSE.DESCRIPTION: You can use paid excused leave 3 times a year for any reason starting from your employment.
TIME.OFF.INFO.CARD.MATERNITY: Having a child: According to Annex-2 of the Labor Law No. 4857, you have 5 days of leave.
TIME.OFF.INFO.CARD.DEATH: Death: According to Annex 2 of the Labor Law No. 4857, you have the right to 3 days of leave in case of death of your first degree relative.
TIME.OFF.INFO.CARD.ADOPTION: Adoption: According to Annex-2 of the Labor Law No. 4857, you have 3 days of leave.
TIME.OFF.INFO.CARD.MARRIAGE: Marriage: According to Annex-2 of the Labor Law No. 4857, you have 3 days of leave.
TIME.OFF.MODAL.TITLE: Cancel Time Off Request
TIME.OFF.MODAL.TEXT: Are you sure you want to cancel the time off requests?
TIME.OFF.REQUESTS.MODAL.TITLE: Delete Time Off Requests
TIME.OFF.REQUESTS.MODAL.TEXT: Are you sure you want to delete the time off requests?
TIME.OFF.INSUFFICIENT.MODAL.TITLE: Time Off Insufficient
TIME.OFF.INSUFFICIENT.MODAL.TEXT: Since there is not enough leave entitlement, your leave balance will go negative. {decreasingDay} days will be deducted from the annual leave you will be entitled to in the next period.

ADVANCE.UPDATE.TITLE: Update Advance Request
ADVANCE.AMOUNT.TO.BE.PAID.ERROR: The finalized payment amount field is required
ADVANCE.MAX.NUMBER.OFF.INSTALLMENTS: Geri Ödeme Taksit Sayısı Maksimum 6 olabilir.
ADVANCE.ERROR.CANSEL: You cannot cancel an advance request whose payment hasn't been completed.
ADVANCE.SALARY.TITLE: Salary Advance
ADVANCE.SALARY.TEXT: This is the type of advance requested by the personnel for their personal expenses.
ADVANCE.BUSINESS.TITLE: Business Advance
ADVANCE.BUSINESS.TEXT: It is the type of advance requested by the personnel for company expenses as required by their job.
ADVANCE.INFORMATION.TEXT.ONE: Personnel who have completed 2 months but have not yet completed 1 year have the right to request an advance payment of 1 salary.
ADVANCE.INFORMATION.TEXT.TWO: Personnel who have completed 1 year have the right to request an advance payment of 2 times their salary.
ADVANCE.INFORMATION.TEXT.THREE: The maximum number of advance installments can be 6.
ADVANCE.INFORMATION.TEXT.FOUR: The maximum advance amount is calculated based on your current salary, previously withdrawn advances and unpaid installments.
ADVANCE.INFORMATION.TEXT.FIVE: Advances requested before the 15th of the month will be deducted from the salary progress of that month, and advances requested after the 15th will be deducted from the salary progress of the following month.
ADVANCE.LIMIT.ERROR: You cannot request an advance more than your advance limit.
ADVANCE.EMPLOYEE.ERROR: Personnel who have not completed 2 months cannot request an advance payment.
ADVANCE.MODAL.TITLE: Cancel Advance Request
ADVANCE.MODAL.TEXT: Are you sure to cancel your advance request?
EXPENSE.ADD.TITLE: Expense Request
EXPENSE.UPDATE.TITLE: Update Expense
EXPENSE.MAX.PAYMENT.TITLE: Maximum {maxPaymentAmount} amount is defined in the expense type you choose.
EXPENSE.MAX.PAYMENT.TEXT: Depending on your administrator, partial or full payment may be made. If a partial payment is made, {maxPaymentAmount} amount will be paid within {amount}, the remaining part payment will not be made.
EXPENSE.MODAL.TITLE: Cancel Expense
EXPENSE.MODAL.TEXT: Are you sure to cancel your expense request?
